00010 Dimension::DimensionIdType& Dimension::nextFreeID () {

00040 
00041 Dimension::DimensionIdType Dimension::getDimensionID(const Dimension::DimensionNameType& name)
00042 {
00043   //get static members one time during initialization
00044   static DimensionIDMap&   dimensionIDs   = Dimension::dimensionIDs();
00045   static DimensionIdType&  nextFreeID     = Dimension::nextFreeID();
00046   static DimensionNameMap& dimensionNames = Dimension::dimensionNames();
00047 
00048   DimensionIDMap::iterator it             = dimensionIDs.lower_bound(name);
00049 
00050   if(it == dimensionIDs.end() || dimensionIDs.key_comp()(name, it->first)) {
00051     DimensionIdType newID = 0;
00052 
00053     //time gets its own id to make sure it has the smallest
00054     if( dimensionIDs.key_comp()(name, "time") || dimensionIDs.key_comp()("time", name) )
00055       newID = nextFreeID++;
00056 
00057     it = dimensionIDs.insert(it, DimensionIDMap::value_type(name, newID));
00058     dimensionNames[newID] = name;
00059   }
00060   return it->second;
00061 }

00063 Dimension::Dimension(const Dimension::DimensionNameType& name)

00073 Argument::Argument(simtime_t_cref timeVal):
00074   time(timeVal), values()
00075 {}
00076 
00077 Argument::Argument(const DimensionSet & dims, simtime_t_cref timeVal):
00078   time(timeVal), values()
00079 {
00080   DimensionSet::const_iterator       it    = dims.begin();
00081   const DimensionSet::const_iterator itEnd = dims.end();
00082 
00083   assert((*it) == Dimension::time);
00084 
00085   for ( ++it; it != itEnd; ++it) {
00086     values.insert( Argument::value_type(*it, Argument::MappedZero) );
00087   }
00088 }

00124 bool Argument::hasArgVal(const Argument::key_type& dim) const{
00125   return values.find(dim) != values.end();

00128 Argument::mapped_type_cref Argument::getArgValue(const Argument::key_type & dim) const
00129 {
00130   const_iterator it = find(dim);
00131 
00132   if(it == values.end())
00133     return MappedZero;
00134 
00135   return it->second;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void Argument::setArgValue(const Argument::key_type& dim, Argument::mapped_type_cref value)
00139 {
00140   assert(!(dim == Dimension::time));
00141 
00142   iterator pos = values.lower_bound(dim);
00143   if(pos != values.end() && !(values.key_comp()(dim, pos->first))) {
00144       // key already exists
00145       // update pos->second if you care to
00146     pos->second = value;
00147     return;
00148   }
00149   values.insert(pos, Argument::value_type(dim, value));
00150 }
00151 
00152 inline Argument::iterator Argument::insertValue(iterator pos, const Argument::value_type& valPair, iterator& itEnd, bool ignoreUnknown) {
00153   pos = values.lower_bound(valPair.first);
00154   if(pos != itEnd && !(values.key_comp()(valPair.first, pos->first))) {
00155       // key already exists
00156       // update pos->second if you care to
00157     pos->second = valPair.second;
00158     return pos;
00159   }
00160   if (ignoreUnknown)
00161     return pos;
00162 
00163   pos   = values.insert(pos, valPair);
00164   itEnd = values.end();
00165   return pos;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void Argument::setArgValues(const Argument& o, bool ignoreUnknown){
00169   time = o.time;
00170 
00171   iterator             pos      = begin();
00172   const const_iterator oEndIter = o.end();
00173   iterator             EndIter  = values.end();
00174 
00175   for(const_iterator it = o.begin(); it != oEndIter; ++it) {
00176     pos = insertValue(pos, *it, EndIter, ignoreUnknown);
00177     if (ignoreUnknown && pos == EndIter)
00178       break; //current dimension was not found and next will be also not in our dimension set
00179   }
00180 }
00181 
00182 bool Argument::isSamePosition(const Argument & o) const
00183 {
00184   if(time != o.time){
00185     return false;
00186   }
00187 
00188   if(values.size() < o.values.size()){
00189     return false;
00190   }
00191 
00192   if(o.values.empty())
00193     return true;
00194 
00195   const_iterator       itO    = o.begin();
00196   const_iterator       it     = begin();
00197   const const_iterator itEnd  = end();
00198   const const_iterator itEndO = o.end();
00199 
00200   while (it != itEnd) {
00201     if (itO->first < it->first) {
00202       break;
00203     } else if (it->first < itO->first)
00204       ++it;
00205     else {
00206       if(it->second != itO->second){
00207         break;
00208       }
00209       ++it;
00210       ++itO;
00211     }
00212     if (itO == itEndO) return true;
00213   }
00214 
00215   return false;
00216 }
00217 
00218 bool Argument::isClose(const Argument& o, Argument::mapped_type_cref epsilon) const{
00219   if(values.size() != o.values.size())
00220     return false;
00221 
00222   if(fabs(SIMTIME_DBL(time - o.time)) > epsilon)
00223     return false;
00224 
00225   const_iterator       itO    = o.begin();
00226   const const_iterator itEnd  = end();
00227   const const_iterator itEndO = o.end();
00228 
00229   for(const_iterator it = begin();
00230     it != itEnd && itO != itEndO; ++it) {
00231 
00232     if(!(it->first == itO->first) || (fabs( it->second - itO->second ) > epsilon)){
00233       return false;
00234     }
00235     ++itO;
00236   }
00237 
00238   return true;
00239 }
00240 
00241 bool Argument::operator==(const Argument & o) const
00242 {
00243   if(time != o.time || values.size() != o.values.size())
00244     return false;
00245 
00246   return compare(o) == 0;
00247 }

00249 Argument& Argument::operator=(const Argument& o){
00250   values = o.values;
00251   time   = o.time;
00252   return *this;
00253 }
00254 
00255 bool Argument::operator<(const Argument & o) const
00256 {
00257   assert(getDimensions() == o.getDimensions());
00258 
00259   return compare(o) < 0;
00260 }
00261 
00262 int Argument::compare(const Argument& o, const DimensionSet *const dims /*= NULL*/) const
00263 {
00264   DimensionSet::const_iterator                 DimItLast; if (dims != NULL) DimItLast = dims->end();
00265   const DimensionSet::const_iterator           DimItEnd  = DimItLast;
00266 
00267   const container_type::const_reverse_iterator rItEnd = values.rend();
00268   const container_type::const_iterator         itEndO = o.values.end();
00269   container_type::const_reverse_iterator       rIt;
00270   container_type::const_iterator               itO;
00271   bool                                         bDidCompare = false;
00272 
00273   //iterate through passed dimensions and compare arguments in these dimensions
00274   for (container_type::const_reverse_iterator rIt = values.rbegin(); rIt != rItEnd; ++rIt) {
00275     bool bMissedDimsEntry = false;
00276 
00277     if (dims != NULL) {
00278       DimensionSet::const_iterator DimItCurr = dims->find(rIt->first);
00279       if (DimItCurr == DimItEnd) {
00280         continue;
00281       }
00282       if (DimItLast != DimItEnd && (--DimItLast) != DimItEnd) {
00283         bMissedDimsEntry = (DimItLast != DimItCurr); // missed something
00284       }
00285       DimItLast = DimItCurr;
00286     }
00287     bDidCompare = true;
00288     //catch special cases time, missing dimension values (after which we can abort)
00289     if( bMissedDimsEntry || (itO = o.values.find(rIt->first)) == itEndO ) {
00290       if (time == o.time)
00291         return 0;
00292       return (time < o.time) ? -1 : 1;
00293     }
00294 
00295     //if both Arguments are defined in the current dimensions
00296     //compare them (otherwise we assume them equal and continue)
00297     if (rIt->second != itO->second)
00298       return (rIt->second < itO->second) ? -1 : 1;
00299   }
00300   if (dims == NULL || (dims->find(Dimension::time) != DimItEnd || (!bDidCompare && !dims->empty()))) {
00301     if (time == o.time)
00302       return 0;
00303     return (time < o.time) ? -1 : 1;
00304   }
00305   return 0;
00306 }

00308 //---Mapping implementation---------------------------------------
00309 
00310 SimpleConstMappingIterator::SimpleConstMappingIterator(const ConstMapping*                            mapping,
00311                                                        const SimpleConstMappingIterator::KeyEntrySet* keyEntries,
00312                                                        const Argument&                                start)
00313   : ConstMappingIterator()
00314   , mapping(mapping)
00315   , dimensions(mapping->getDimensionSet())
00316   , position(mapping->getDimensionSet(), start.getTime())
00317   , keyEntries(keyEntries)
00318   , nextEntry()
00319 {
00320   assert(keyEntries);
00321 
00322   //the passed start position should define a value for every dimension
00323   //of this iterators underlying mapping.
00324   assert(start.getDimensions().isSubSet(dimensions));
00325 
00326   //Since the position is compared to the key entries we have to make
00327   //sure it always contains only the dimensions of the underlying mapping.
00328   //(the passed Argument might have more dimensions)
00329   position.setArgValues(start, true);
00330 
00331   nextEntry = keyEntries->upper_bound(position);
00332 }
00333 
00334 SimpleConstMappingIterator::SimpleConstMappingIterator(const ConstMapping*                            mapping,
00335                                                        const SimpleConstMappingIterator::KeyEntrySet* keyEntries)
00336   : ConstMappingIterator()
00337   , mapping(mapping)
00338   , dimensions(mapping->getDimensionSet())
00339   , position(dimensions)
00340   , keyEntries(keyEntries)
00341   , nextEntry()
00342 {
00343   assert(keyEntries);
00344 
00345   jumpToBegin();
00346 }
00347 
00348 void SimpleConstMapping::createKeyEntries(const Argument& from, const Argument& to, const Argument& step, Argument& pos)
00349 {
00350   //get iteration borders and steps
00351   simtime_t_cref fromT = from.getTime();
00352   simtime_t_cref toT   = to.getTime();
00353   simtime_t_cref stepT = step.getTime();
00354 
00355   //iterate over interval without the end of the interval
00356   for(simtime_t t = fromT; t < toT; t += stepT){
00357     //create key entry at current position
00358     pos.setTime(t);
00359     keyEntries.insert(pos);
00360   }
00361 
00362   //makes sure that the end of the interval becomes it own key entry
00363   pos.setTime(toT);
00364   keyEntries.insert(pos);
00365 }
00366 
00367 void SimpleConstMapping::createKeyEntries(const Argument& from, const Argument& to, const Argument& step,
00368                                           DimensionSet::const_iterator curDim, Argument& pos)
00369 {
00370   //get the dimension to iterate over
00371   DimensionSet::const_reference d = *curDim;
00372 
00373   //increase iterator to next dimension (means curDim now stores the next dimension)
00374   --curDim;
00375   bool nextIsTime = (*curDim == Dimension::time);
00376 
00377   //get our iteration borders and steps
00378   argument_value_cref_t fromD = from.getArgValue(d);
00379   argument_value_cref_t toD   = to.getArgValue(d);
00380   argument_value_cref_t stepD = step.getArgValue(d);
00381 
00382   //iterate over interval without the last entry
00383   for(argument_value_t i = fromD; i < toD; i += stepD){
00384     pos.setArgValue(d, i); //update position
00385 
00386     //call iteration over sub dimension
00387     if(nextIsTime){
00388       createKeyEntries(from, to, step, pos);
00389     } else {
00390       createKeyEntries(from, to, step, curDim, pos);
00391     }
00392   }
00393 
00394   //makes sure that the end of the interval has its own key entry
00395   pos.setArgValue(d, toD);
00396   if(nextIsTime){
00397     createKeyEntries(from, to, step, pos);
00398   } else {
00399     createKeyEntries(from, to, step, curDim, pos);
00400   }
00401 }
00402 
00403 void SimpleConstMapping::initializeArguments(const Argument& min,
00404                                              const Argument& max,
00405                                              const Argument& interval) {
00406   keyEntries.clear();
00407   DimensionSet::const_iterator dimIt = --(dimensions.end());
00408   Argument                     pos   = min;
00409 
00410   if(*dimIt == Dimension::time)
00411     createKeyEntries(min, max, interval, pos);
00412   else
00413     createKeyEntries(min, max, interval, dimIt, pos);
00414 }
